# Installation
> `npm install --save @types/lodash`

# Summary
This package contains type definitions for Lo-Dash (http://lodash.com/).

# Details
Files were exported from https://www.github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/tree/master/lodash

Additional Details
 * Last updated: Mon, 30 Jan 2017 18:31:48 GMT
 * Dependencies: none
 * Global values: _
